mapper.select: SELECT a.company_id, b.company_name, a.technology_id, c.technology_name, c.technology_thumbnail_square, c.technology_thumbnail_rectangle, a.recruit_level FROM shangshufang_customer.technology_using a INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.company b ON a.company_id = b.company_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.technology c ON a.technology_id = c.technology_id WHERE a.company_id = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.recruit_level;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.technology_using ( company_id, technology_id, recruit_level, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{companyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{technologyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recruitLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
